awurudu dedahas pansiyak dan wayasayi mata mage du puthune...lekiri dun un leth urabi le kalandak wath na dethane...daruwoth waduwa daruwoth haduwa un wadi hariyak sora detuwo...daruwan wuwa un parayan marayan mage de ka mata wina ketuwo...unun kotawala ugul atawala rajawethi mage un hamadamath...mage rajadaruwan mage jana daruwan gana baluwe na kawadawath...thaman hadenu misa nangila mallila hadanta oona kamak nathi...ge dora kana kara ukasata thiyala walandath wikuna gena budithi...uthure daruwan miyadi iwarayi dakune daruwoth miya adethi...magema mahaun mage nama wikuna kotawa mage daruwan marathi...awurudu pandahasak thawa innata paramayusha mata athi bawini...mage podi patawuni thepiwath mesora muluwen ma galawanu manawi…gayanaya :- nanda malani pada rachanaya :- mahacharya sunil aariyarathnasangithaya:- stanli piris

“ape sankalpa idiriyata gena yanna balaporoththu wenawa.wishala naya barak thiyagena apa subasadhanaya kappadu kara na.biliyanayak thakshana widyala wenuwen wen kara thibenawa.rajayak lesa naya gewiya yuthuyi.rate wishala rajya sewayak thibenawa.in nisi paladayithawa labagannawada kiya asiya yuthuyi.wishala washayen wishrama watup gewana ratak.api aluth widiyata sithiya yuthuyi.me rate naya kalamanakaranayata kandayamak lesa katayuthu kala yuthuyi.mudal amathyanshaya kandayamak lesa katayuthu karanawa.podu janathawata sahanadayithawayak athi kirimata rate honda mudal palanayak thibiya yuthuyi.”
